name: URigVMGraph
doc:
The Graph represents a Function definition
using Nodes as statements.
Graphs can be compiled into a URigVM using the
FRigVMCompiler.
Graphs provide access to its Nodes, Pins and
Links.

methods.name: ContainsLink
methods.doc: Returns true if the graph contains a link given its string representation

methods.name: FindLink
methods.doc:
Returns a link given its string representation,
for example "NodeA.Color.R -> NodeB.Translation.X"

methods.name: FindNode
methods.doc:
Returns a Node given its path (or nullptr).
(for now this is the same as finding a node by its name.)

methods.name: FindNodeByName
methods.doc: Returns a Node given its name (or nullptr).

methods.name: FindPin
methods.doc: Returns a Pin given its path, for example "Node.Color.R".

methods.name: GetContainedGraphs
methods.doc: Returns all of the contained graphs

methods.name: GetDefaultFunctionLibrary
methods.doc: Returns the locally available function library

methods.name: GetEntryNode
methods.doc: Returns the entry node of this graph

methods.name: GetEventNames
methods.doc: Returns array of event names

methods.name: GetGraphDepth
methods.doc: Returns the root / top level parent graph of this graph (or this if it is the root graph)

methods.name: GetGraphName
methods.doc: Returns the name of this graph (as defined by the node path)

methods.name: GetInputArguments
methods.doc: Returns the input arguments of this graph

methods.name: GetLinks
methods.doc: Returns all of the Links within this Graph.

methods.name: GetLocalVariables
methods.doc: Returns the local variables of this function

methods.name: GetNodePath
methods.doc: Returns the path of this graph as defined by its invoking nodes

methods.name: GetNodes
methods.doc: Returns all of the Nodes within this Graph.

methods.name: GetOutputArguments
methods.doc: Returns the output arguments of this graph

methods.name: GetParentGraph
methods.doc: Returns the parent graph of this graph

methods.name: GetReturnNode
methods.doc: Returns the return node of this graph

methods.name: GetRootGraph
methods.doc: Returns the root / top level parent graph of this graph (or this if it is the root graph)

methods.name: GetSelectNodes
methods.doc: Returns the names of all currently selected Nodes.

methods.name: GetVariableDescriptions
methods.doc:
Returns a list of unique Variable descriptions within this Graph.
Multiple Variable Nodes can share the same description.

methods.name: IsNodeSelected
methods.doc: Returns true if a Node with a given name is selected.

methods.name: IsRootGraph
methods.doc: Returns true if this graph is a root / top level graph

methods.name: IsTopLevelGraph
methods.doc: Returns true if this graph is the top level graph
